hero.heading: Discover Cultural Symbols from Around the World
hero.subheading: Explore, understand, and connect with the rich symbolic heritage across diverse cultures and traditions

exploreBanner.title: Join Thematic Communities

error.routeNotExist: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

community.title: Join a Vibrant Community
community.description: Connect with enthusiasts, researchers, and creators who share your passion for cultural symbols and patterns.

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join groups focused on specific cultural themes, historical periods, or symbol categories.

personalSpace.title: Personal Collections
personalSpace.description: Create your own collections of symbols and patterns, organize your findings and share them with others.

intuitiveNavigation.title: Intuitive Navigation
intuitiveNavigation.description: Easily navigate between communities, discover related symbols, and find collaborative projects.

callToAction.description: Be part of a growing network dedicated to documenting, analyzing, and preserving cultural symbols from around the world.
callToAction.support: We welcome contributors of all backgrounds and expertise levels.

about.title: About Our Project
about.subtitle: Documenting and preserving cultural symbols for future generations

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We aim to create a comprehensive digital archive of cultural symbols and patterns from around the world, making them accessible for study, appreciation, and cultural preservation.
mission.description2: Through collaboration between experts and enthusiasts, we work to document the contexts, meanings, and visual languages that have shaped human expression throughout history.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We envision a world where cultural symbols are preserved, understood, and celebrated across generations:
vision.value1: Accessibility for all, regardless of background

member1.name: Dr. Emily Chen
member1.bio: Specializing in symbolic systems across Asian cultures, with 15 years of fieldwork experience.

member2.name: Marco Rossi
member2.bio: Expert in applying AI to cultural heritage preservation and digital archiving techniques.

member3.name: Aisha Nkosi
member3.bio: Coordinates our global network of contributors and manages educational outreach programs.

analysisProcess.title: Our Analysis Process
analysisProcess.subtitle: How we document and classify cultural symbols

process.example: Our system identifies and extracts patterns, then matches them with our database of known symbols.
